title: Omniscient Readerâ€™s Viewpoint, Vol. 1
description: Prologue - Episode 36Only I know the end of this world.One day our MC finds himself stuck in the world of his favorite webnovel. What does he do to survive? It is a world struck by catastrophe and danger all around.His edge? He knows the plot of the story to the end. Because he was the sole reader that stuck with it. Read his story to see how he survives!
author: Singshong
